scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross at the center. To the left, a group of figures mourns, including a woman in a dark robe kneeling and another standing behind her. To the right, three men in contemporary attire observe the scene. The background suggests an outdoor setting with a distant cityscape and trees. The overall composition is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
